name: misanalysis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of forming the wrong opinion or judgment about something after experiencing it, or after studying or examining it: Learners had difficulty recovering from an initial misanalysis of sentences like these. These arguments matter because mis-analysis leads to serious mistakes. Related word
analysis
More examplesFewer examplesMisanalyses may also occur during other stages.This conclusion rests on a misanalysis of the example.In these cases, incorrect use could be traced to specific misanalyses of what was heard.Your arrogant mis-analysis is quite unbelievable - this is not the reason for what happened. It is advisable to collect a "mid-stream" sample of urine to avoid misanalysis.
